IPL98 Template functions (global)
[IPL98 Global C++ only constants and template functions.]

Functions

  • template<class TYPE> double RadToDegree (TYPE &Rad)
    Conversion from Radians to Degrees (global constant).

  • template<class TYPE> double DegreeToRad (TYPE &Degree)
    Conversion from Degrees to Radians (global constant).

  • template<class TYPE> TYPE Sqr (const TYPE &x)
    Calculate the square of given parameter value.

  • template<class TYPE> void Swap (TYPE &x, TYPE &y)
    Swap the values - copy x value to y and copy y value to x.

  • template<class TYPE> TYPE Max (const TYPE x, const TYPE y)
    Get the maximum value of x and y.

  • template<class TYPE> TYPE Min (const TYPE &x, const TYPE &y)
    Get the minimum value of x and y.

  • template<class TYPE> int Round (const TYPE &x)
    Round x to nearest integer value.

  • template<class TYPE> unsigned char RoundUINT8 (const TYPE &x)
    Round x to nearest UINT8 value, or if x>255 then x=255, or if x<0 then x=0.

Detailed Description

        #include <ipl98/cpp/ipl98_general_functions.h>
Basic small template functions which may be usefull everywhere.
